name: py-dask

description: Dask is a flexible parallel computing library for analytics.

dependencies.name: py-bokeh
dependencies.description: Statistical and novel interactive HTML plots for Python

dependencies.name: py-click
dependencies.description: Python composable command line interface toolkit.

dependencies.name: py-cloudpickle
dependencies.description: Extended pickling support for Python objects.

dependencies.name: py-jinja2
dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pandas
dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.

dependencies.name: py-partd
dependencies.description: Key-value byte store with appendable values.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-toolz
dependencies.description: A set of utility functions for iterators, functions, and dictionaries

dependencies.name: py-versioneer
dependencies.description:
Versioneer is a tool to automatically update version strings by asking
your version-control system about the current tree.

dependent_to.name: py-astropy
dependent_to.description:
The Astropy Project is a community effort to develop a single core
package for Astronomy in Python and foster interoperability between
Python astronomy packages.

dependent_to.name: py-datacube
dependent_to.description: An analysis environment for satellite and other earth observation data.

dependent_to.name: py-thewalrus
dependent_to.description:
A library for the calculation of hafnians, Hermite polynomials and
Gaussian boson sampling.

dependent_to.name: py-pathml
dependent_to.description: An open-source toolkit for computational pathology and machine learning.

dependent_to.name: py-graphcast
dependent_to.description: GraphCast: Learning skillful medium-range global weather forecasting.

dependent_to.name: py-xhistogram
dependent_to.description: Fast, flexible, label-aware histograms for numpy and xarray.

dependent_to.name: py-sfepy
dependent_to.description:
SfePy (https://sfepy.org/) is a software for solving systems of coupled
partial differential equations (PDEs) by the finite element method in
1D, 2D and 3D. It can be viewed both as black-box PDE solver, and as a
Python package which can be used for building custom applications.

dependent_to.name: py-xgboost
dependent_to.description:
XGBoost is an optimized distributed gradient boosting library designed
to be highly efficient, flexible and portable.

dependent_to.name: py-earth2mip
dependent_to.description:
Earth-2 Model Intercomparison Project (MIP). A python framework that
enables climate researchers and scientists to explore and experiment
with AI models for weather and climate.

dependent_to.name: py-modin
dependent_to.description: Modin: Make your pandas code run faster by changing one line of code.

dependent_to.name: py-scikit-image
dependent_to.description:
Image processing algorithms for SciPy, including IO, morphology,
filtering, warping, color manipulation, object detection, etc.

dependent_to.name: py-smac
dependent_to.description:
SMAC is a tool for algorithm configuration to optimize the parameters of
arbitrary algorithms, including hyperparameter optimization of Machine
Learning algorithms.

dependent_to.name: py-xarray
dependent_to.description: N-D labeled arrays and datasets in Python

dependent_to.name: py-dask-glm
dependent_to.description:
Dask-glm is a library for fitting Generalized Linear Models on large
datasets.
